Les points que vous avez entrez sont :
P_0= (-6.3700000000000001E+000, -2.1400000000000001E+000)
P_1= ( 3.2500000000000000E+000, -7.9900000000000002E+000)
P_2= ( 8.0999999999999996E+000, -2.7000000000000002E+000)
P_3= ( 1.3779999999999999E+001, -6.6799999999999997E+000)
P_4= ( 1.5000000000000000E+001, -2.0000000000000000E+000)

La fonction spline cubique reliant le point 1 au point 2 est : 
S1(X)=  0.00000000000000000000E+0000*( 3.2500000000000000E+000-X)^3 +  9.93792347320898336527E-0003*(X--6.3700000000000001E+000)^3 + -2.22453222453222463687E-0001*( 3.2500000000000000E+000-X) + -1.75026049563537203484E+0000*(X--6.3700000000000001E+000) 
La fonction spline cubique reliant le point 2 au point 3 est : 
S2(X)=  1.97119224355196758830E-0002*( 8.0999999999999996E+000-X)^3 + -4.53997646310750111109E-0002*(X- 3.2500000000000000E+000)^3 + -2.11109637590188280675E+0000*( 8.0999999999999996E+000-X) +  5.11214932606626663446E-0001*(X- 3.2500000000000000E+000) 
La fonction spline cubique reliant le point 3 au point 4 est : 
S3(X)= -3.87656440951960913339E-0002*( 1.3779999999999999E+001-X)^3 +  7.38344880993500734886E-0002*(X- 8.0999999999999996E+000)^3 +  7.75320603380797858752E-0001*( 1.3779999999999999E+001-X) + -3.55813412688464059553E+0000*(X- 8.0999999999999996E+000) 
La fonction spline cubique reliant le point 4 au point 5 est : 
S4(X)=  3.43754010167465718522E-0001*( 1.5000000000000000E+001-X)^3 +  0.00000000000000000000E+0000*(X- 1.3779999999999999E+001)^3 + -5.98705330479882717916E+0000*( 1.5000000000000000E+001-X) + -1.63934426229508110797E+0000*(X- 1.3779999999999999E+001) 

Pour afficher ces fonctions splines sur un intervalle plus appropri√© dans Geogebra :
fonction[S1(x),-6.3700000000000001E+000, 3.2500000000000000E+000]
fonction[S2(x), 3.2500000000000000E+000, 8.0999999999999996E+000]
fonction[S3(x), 8.0999999999999996E+000, 1.3779999999999999E+001]
fonction[S4(x), 1.3779999999999999E+001, 1.5000000000000000E+001]
